data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Demir Hisar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Demir Hisar, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Demir Hisar, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Demir Hisar, North Macedonia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Demir Hisar you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Albanian, Macedonian people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Demir Hisar to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Demir Hisar, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Demir Hisar, North Macedonia has a population of 10,700.

We estimate Demir Hisar has 18 people who might know Jesus, 6,613 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,069 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 594 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 18 believers in Demir Hisar to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 10,682 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
